edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.factories

Class DefaultStrategyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.factories.DefaultStrategyFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Factory, InitializableFactory, StrategyFactory

    public class DefaultStrategyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements StrategyFactory
    A default implementation of the StrategyFactory interface. Instances of this class will be accessible via the DefaultFactoryManager, and will be configured using the Lida XML configuration files.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • defaultStrategies

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.strategies.Strategy>,java.lang.String> defaultStrategies
        Strategies that were registered as defaults. This map is used when a strategy "name" is not provided to getStrategy.

      • strategies

        protected final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.strategies.Strategy> strategies
        Map of all the strategies (of any type) available to this factory

    • Method Detail

      • getStrategy

        public <T extends edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.strategies.Strategy> T getStrategy(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Description copied from interface: StrategyFactory
        Returns a default implementation matching the specified Strategy interface. If no match is found for the specified interface, or no strategy was registered as the default for that type, then null will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getStrategy in interface StrategyFactory
        Parameters:
        type - a Strategy interface for which an implementation will be returned
        Returns:
        an implementation for the specified interface

      • getStrategy

        public <T extends edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.strategies.Strategy> T getStrategy(java.lang.String name,
                                                                            java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Description copied from interface: StrategyFactory
        Returns an implementation matching the requested alias and type, or null if the factory does not contain a matching Strategy.
        Specified by:
        getStrategy in interface StrategyFactory
        Parameters:
        name - an alias for the strategy (set in the XML factory configuration)
        type - the interface corresponding to the desired Strategy implementation
        Returns:
        an object that implements the desired type and is parameterized based on the corresponding alias in the LidaFactories XML configuration.

      • init

        public void init(edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.initialization.config.xml.schema.LidaFactoryDef factoryDef)
        Description copied from interface: InitializableFactory
        Initializes this factory based on the details specified in the supplied LidaFactoryDef.
        Specified by:
        init in interface InitializableFactory
        Parameters:
        factoryDef - a LidaFactoryDef containing initialization details
